title: Half The Battle Over Net Neutrality Is Defining What It Means
teaser: President Obama's call for stronger net neutrality rules touched off a round of heated debate. Broadband companies and their allies say the plan is tantamount to "regulating the Internet" and would hurt innovation. But net neutrality advocates say otherwise.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
